meanings.definition: To coat or surround with a thin layer of material on a small scale.
meanings.sent1: The chef will microencapsulate the dessert with a delicate glaze.
meanings.sent2: They plan to microencapsulate the seeds for better germination.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to microencapsulate itself in a box.
meanings.sent4: The music seemed to microencapsulate the emotions of the crowd.
meanings.sent5: The scent of flowers seemed to microencapsulate the entire garden.
